channel.title: How do i make a shop?
channel.description: i am wanting to make a shop for my server how do i do that?

item.title: How do i make a shop?
item.dc:creator: @The_rune_pur3 The rune pur3
item.description:
@The_rune_pur3 wrote:

Use this program, scan it if you want but it is clean, all you need is a npc list and item list
http://rs80l3.rapidshare.com/cgi-bin/upload.cgi?rsuploadid=2156140522974591

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a shop?

item.title: How do i make a shop?
item.dc:creator: @i_am_an_elf i am an elf
item.description:
@i_am_an_elf wrote:

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount

shop id is the npcs id you want for the shop.
shop name is pretty much anyhting you want the shop to be called
sell is what it sells
and buy is what it buys
and amount is how much of that item it carries.

you also need to go into autospawn cfg and use this format

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption thats pretty much self explanitory

Read full topic
